name: recurUntilOption
signature: <A, B>(pf: (a: A) => Option<B>) => Schedule<Option<B>, A, never>
description:
A schedule that recurs until the input value matches a partial function, then
maps the value.
*Details This schedule continues executing until the provided partial function `pf`
returns `Some(value)`. At that point, it stops and maps the resulting value
to an `Option<B>`. If `pf` returns `None`, the schedule continues. This is useful when defining schedules that should stop once a certain
condition is met and transform the final value before completion.
